TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SemaphoreSlim extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: Represents a lightweight alternative to that limits the number of threads that can access a resource or pool of resources concurrently.

span.span: Represents a lightweight alternative to that limits the number of threads that can access a resource or pool of resources concurrently.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 信号量有两种类型： 本地信号量和已命名的系统信号量。Semaphores are of two types: local semaphores and named system semaphores. 前者是本地的应用程序。The former is local to an app. 后一种显示整个操作系统也适用于进程间同步。The latter is visible throughout the operating system and is suitable for inter-process synchronization. 是一种轻型替代方法不使用 Windows 内核信号量的类。The is a lightweight alternative to the class that doesn't use Windows kernel semaphores. 与不同类，类不支持已命名的系统信号量。Unlike the class, the class doesn't support named system semaphores. 您可以使用它作为本地信号量。You can use it as a local semaphore only. 类是一个应用程序内用于同步的建议信号量。The class is the recommended semaphore for synchronization within a single app. 轻量级信号量可以控制对本地应用程序的资源池。A lightweight semaphore controls access to a pool of resources that is local to your application. 当您实例化一个信号量时，可以指定的最大可以同时进入信号量的线程数。When you instantiate a semaphore, you can specify the maximum number of threads that can enter the semaphore concurrently. 您还指定了初始的同时进入信号量的线程数。You also specify the initial number of threads that can enter the semaphore concurrently. 此项定义的信号量计数。This defines the semaphore's count. 计数将减少每次一个线程进入信号量，并在每次递增一个线程释放信号量。The count is decremented each time a thread enters the semaphore, and incremented each time a thread releases the semaphore. 若要输入信号量，线程调用之一或重载。To enter the semaphore, a thread calls one of the or overloads. 若要释放信号量，它调用其中一种重载。To release the semaphore, it calls one of the overloads. 当计数达到零时，后续调用一种`Wait`方法阻止，直到其他线程释放信号量。When the count reaches zero, subsequent calls to one of the `Wait` methods block until other threads release the semaphore. 如果多个线程都受到阻止，没有任何有保证的顺序，如先进先出或后进先出，控制当线程进入信号量。If multiple threads are blocked, there is no guaranteed order, such as FIFO or LIFO, that controls when threads enter the semaphore. 使用信号量来保护资源的代码的基本结构为：The basic structure for code that uses a semaphore to protect resources is: ```vb ' Enter semaphore by calling one of the Wait or WaitAsync methods. SemaphoreSlim.Wait() ' ' Execute code protected by the semaphore. ' SemaphoreSlim.Release() ``` 如果所有线程都已都释放信号量，计数是最大值时指定创建信号量。When all threads have released the semaphore, the count is at the maximum value specified when the semaphore was created. 信号量的计数是可从属性。The semaphore's count is available from the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 类并不强制在调用线程或任务标识， ，和方法。The class doesn't enforce thread or task identity on calls to the , , and methods. 此外，如果构造函数用于实例化对象，属性可以提高超出由构造函数设置的值。In addition, if the constructor is used to instantiate the object, the property can increase beyond the value set by the constructor. 它负责的程序员确保，对或方法相应地与对的调用配对方法。It is the programmer's responsibility to ensure that calls to or methods are appropriately paired with calls to methods. ## Examples 下面的示例创建三个线程的最大计数和初始计数为零个线程的信号量。The following example creates a semaphore with a maximum count of three threads and an initial count of zero threads. 该示例启动五个任务，所有这些阻止等待信号量。The example starts five tasks, all of which block waiting for the semaphore. 主线程调用重载来增加到其最大值，它允许三个任务进入信号量的信号量计数。The main thread calls the overload to increase the semaphore count to its maximum, which allows three tasks to enter the semaphore. 释放信号量时，每个时间显示前一个信号量计数。Each time the semaphore is released, the previous semaphore count is displayed. 控制台消息跟踪信号量的使用。Console messages track semaphore use. 模拟的工作时间间隔都稍有增加，为每个线程以使输出更易于阅读。The simulated work interval is increased slightly for each thread to make the output easier to read. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.SemaphoreSlim#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.semaphoreslim/cs/example.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.SemaphoreSlim#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.semaphoreslim/vb/example.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 所有公共和受保护成员是线程安全的可同时从多个线程，除，必须使用时，才在所有其他操作已完成。

span.span: All public and protected members of are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads, with the exception of , which must be used only when all other operations on the have completed.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the initial number of requests that can be granted concurrently.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `initialCount`参数定义的输入可以授予的信号量的并发请求数。The `initialCount` parameter defines the number of concurrent requests to enter the semaphore that can be granted. 但是，它不会定义的最大可以同时授予的请求数。However, it doesn't define the maximum number of requests that can be granted concurrently. 一个通过调用此构造函数实例化对象不会引发异常，如果调用方法的值增加超出属性`initialCount`。A object instantiated by calling this constructor doesn't throw a exception if a call to the method increases the value of the property beyond `initialCount`. 如果有多个调用发生这种情况比此处的方法是向或方法。This occurs if there are more calls to methods than there are to or methods. 若要设置最大的并发请求输入可以授予的信号量，请调用构造函数。To set the maximum number of concurrent requests to enter the semaphore that can be granted, call the constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅当必须在 SemaphoreSlim 以及其他基于内核的同步对象与同一个等待句柄上等待时，请使用此属性。Use this property only when you must wait on a SemaphoreSlim together with other kernel-based synchronization objects with the same wait handle. 成功的等待时间并不意味着成功等待上本身，也不会减少信号量的计数。A successful wait on the does not imply a successful wait on the itself, nor does it decrement the semaphore's count. 可用的等待句柄发出信号后，你应等待专门。After the available wait handle is signaled, you should wait on the specifically.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 初始值属性设置为调用类构造函数。The initial value of the property is set by the call to the class constructor. 它会减少每次调用或方法，并按每次调用递增方法。It is decremented by each call to the or method, and incremented by each call to the method.

summary.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

span.span: Releases all resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 `Dispose` 后，应调用 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法使 处于不可用状态。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用`Dispose`，必须释放对所有引用这样垃圾回收器才能收回内存的占用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 `Dispose` 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call `Dispose` before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果超时时间设置为-1 毫秒，则该方法将无限期等待。If the timeout is set to -1 milliseconds, the method waits indefinitely. 如果超时时间设置为零毫秒，不会阻止该方法。If the timeout is set to zero milliseconds, the method doesn't block. 它测试等待句柄的状态并立即返回。It tests the state of the wait handle and returns immediately. 如果线程或任务能够进入信号量，它递减通过其中一个属性。If a thread or task is able to enter the semaphore, it decrements the property by one. 如果调用时，被阻止的线程或任务和指定的超时间隔`millisecondsTimeout`过期：If a thread or task is blocked when calling and the timeout interval specified by `millisecondsTimeout` expires: - 线程或任务不会进入信号量。The thread or task doesn't enter the semaphore. - 属性不是递减。The property isn't decremented.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果线程或任务能够进入信号量，它递减通过其中一个属性。If a thread or task is able to enter the semaphore, it decrements the property by one. 如果`cancellationToken`是取消，线程或任务不会进入信号量，和属性不是递减。If `cancellationToken` is cancelled, the thread or task doesn't enter the semaphore, and the property isn't decremented. 相反，该方法将引发异常。Instead, the method throws an exception.

Public Function WaitAsync (timeout As TimeSpan) As Task(Of Boolean)

param.name: timeout
param.span: A that represents the number of milliseconds to wait, a that represents -1 milliseconds to wait indefinitely, or a that represents 0 milliseconds to test the wait handle and return immediately.

span.span: A that represents the number of milliseconds to wait, a that represents -1 milliseconds to wait indefinitely, or a that represents 0 milliseconds to test the wait handle and return immediately.

summary.span: Asynchronously waits to enter the , using a to measure the time interval.

span.span: Asynchronously waits to enter the , using a to measure the time interval.

returns.span: A task that will complete with a result of if the current thread successfully entered the , otherwise with a result of .

span.span: A task that will complete with a result of if the current thread successfully entered the , otherwise with a result of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果超时时间设置为-1 毫秒，则该方法将无限期等待。If the timeout is set to -1 milliseconds, the method waits indefinitely. 如果超时时间设置为零毫秒，不会阻止该方法。If the timeout is set to zero milliseconds, the method doesn't block. 它测试等待句柄的状态并立即返回。It tests the state of the wait handle and returns immediately.
